events.message: I received the wrong size for my recent order and would like to request a refund or exchange as soon as possible.
The system has identified this case under the refund cluster due to keywords like refund and exchange.
A customer support agent has been assigned to review the refund request for the incorrect item size delivered.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I’m here to help you with your refund request regarding the wrong item size.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm whether you would prefer a refund or an exchange for the product?
My order number is 123456789. I would prefer to get a refund since I need the correct size urgently elsewhere.
Thank you for the information. We will process a full refund to your original payment method within 3 to 5 business days.
Thanks for the quick response. I appreciate the refund process started promptly.
We’ve completed your refund processing. Please check your account in a few days and contact us if there are any issues.
Just following up to ensure your refund has been received and that you are satisfied with the resolution.
Since there have been no further concerns, we are closing this case now. Thank you for contacting our support.
